snippet.title: Antipa extends Minyari gold mineralisation
snippet.content: Antipa Minerals has extended the Minyari high-grade gold mineralisation to +400m of strike and remains open at the North Telfer project. Improved continuity of Minyari deposit high-grade gold mineralisation has been identified via south-southwest directed drill holes. Further phase 2 drilling program is expected to commence this quarter. Originally published as
